FuncDef: The reset sflow packet statistics command clears statistics about sFlow packets sent on a specified interface or sFlow packets sent and received on a specified board.
CLIs: reset sflow packet statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies an interface type and number.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset sflow packet statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1 slot 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset statistics about sFlow packets sent on a specified interface or sFlow packets sent and received on a specified board, run the reset sflow packet statistics command.
